results.name: Largest squarefree number dividing phi of n.
comment: Also largest squarefree number dividing Carmichael's lambda, A002322(n). - _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 17 2017
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: a(m * n) = A007947(a(m) * a(n)) if gcd(m, n) = 1. - _David A. Corneth_, Jul 16 2017
program: (PARI) A080400(n) = factorback(factorint(eulerphi(n))[, 1]); \\ _Antti Karttunen_ & _David A. Corneth_, Jul 16 2017
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 19 2003
